issues.title: Error when trying to start the server on Debian 10
issues.body:
When doing `python start_server.py` i get

`Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "start_server.py", line 1, in <module>
    from config import zeronet_directory
  File "/tmp/zeromail-to-email-client-transport/config.py", line 14, in <module>
    import Config
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'Config'`
